professional_summary: Business Management Professional with experience reporting to CEOs and C-Level management, known for leading multi-generational employees and managing multiple projects to meet deadlines. Skilled in handling confidential matters and utilizing professional discretion.

key_responsibilities: Manage Global Supplier Database
Analyze and update vendor qualifications at bid stage
Analyze vendor financial statements and work with finance team to mitigate risks
Update and Record new policies in the Sourcing Power Procurement Manual
Present and communicate changes in procedure to Procurement professionals
Develop and implement Power BI for departmental reporting needs
Regular volunteer work with United Way of Greater Kansas City
Create and implement process to document and control PO requests from vendors
Receive PO requests and issue POs to vendors through client system
Assist Project Controls with Cost Control activities
including monitoring multiple projects through EcoSys
Assist Site Acquisition and Construction teams with progress/milestone tracking
Assist Finance with PO Booking
issuing POs to client
and tracking billable milestones
Analyze job scope for LTE
UMTS
ETTCS
C-RAN/Small Cell
and NSB projects
Review and approve deliverables and invoices
Develop Power BI tools for data analysis
Support sales management with scheduling and organizational tasks
Administer Salesforce.com for client tracking and lead generation
Organize and lead customer satisfaction improvement initiatives
Support executive team with administrative tasks and project management
Create and distribute company communications
Lead Lean Initiatives to improve processes and reduce AR issues
Maintain client records and ensure compliance with data privacy standards
Volunteer with Crosslines in community outreach
